text: Is there any way that I can show a progress bar when I am using the `Serialization` standard library to serialize something to disk or load something from disk?

elements.text: Is there any way that I can show a progress bar when I am using the
standard library to serialize something to disk or load something from disk?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Have you seen the ProgressMeter.jl package? If the serialization is done manually, you can easily add a progress bar. If using some sort of package, you'd probably need to hook into the library's serialization function

elements.text: Have you seen the ProgressMeter.jl package? If the serialization is done manually, you can easily add a progress bar. If using some sort of package, you'd probably need to hook into the library's serialization function
